comment.author: 43808807@N00
comment._content: It's the translation! Public washing place! NOT Public 'washroom'.

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:
From 1897. Absolutely one of my favorites. For more details:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/trialsanderrors/2877988741/]

comment.author: 63061856@N00
comment._content:
The lavatories ("truogoli") are still there, and the area has been restored in recent years.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/m_bree/1858452390/]

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for catching Detroit Publishing Company's translation error.  It is indeed a public laundry, not lavatory.  We will correct the information the next time we update the record.  Thanks Daniele Purrone for the recent photos.
